;===============================================================
;== ANCILLARY TRIGGERS START HERE ==============================
;===============================================================

; Trigger for academic_advisor
Trigger fixed_birth_academic_advisor
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary academic_advisor Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for architect
Trigger fixed_birth_architect
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary architect Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for brilliant_inventor
Trigger fixed_birth_brilliant_inventor
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary brilliant_inventor Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for bodyguard
Trigger fixed_birth_bodyguard
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary bodyguard Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for drillmaster
Trigger fixed_birth_drillmaster
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary drillmaster Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for mathematician
Trigger fixed_birth_mathematician
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary mathematician Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for handgun
Trigger fixed_birth_handgun
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary handgun Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for librarian
Trigger fixed_birth_librarian
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary librarian Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for military_engineer
Trigger fixed_birth_military_engineer
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary military_engineer Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for money_counter
Trigger fixed_birth_money_counter
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary money_counter Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for ordinance_master
Trigger fixed_birth_ordnance_master
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary ordinance_master Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for overseer
Trigger fixed_birth_overseer
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary overseer Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for quartermaster
Trigger fixed_birth_quartermaster
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary quartermaster Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for scout

    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary scout Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for spymaster
Trigger fixed_birth_spymaster
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary spymaster Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for treasurer
Trigger fixed_birth_treasurer
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary treasurer Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

; Trigger for tutor
Trigger fixed_birth_tutor
    WhenToTest CharacterComesOfAge
    AcquireAncillary tutor Chance  10

Trigger Lesser_General_Adoption
    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    AcquireAncillary academic_advisor Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    AcquireAncillary architect Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest LesserGeneralOfferedForAdoption

    AcquireAncillary brilliant_inventor Chance  10

Trigger Worth_of_Adoption_Academic_Advisor
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    AcquireAncillary academic_advisor Chance  10

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    AcquireAncillary architect Chance  10

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    AcquireAncillary quartermaster Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    AcquireAncillary scout Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    AcquireAncillary spymaster Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Worth_of_Adoption_Treasurer
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    AcquireAncillary treasurer Chance  10
;------------------------------------------

Trigger Worth_of_Adoption_Tutor
    WhenToTest OfferedForAdoption
    AcquireAncillary tutor Chance  10
;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_AcademicAdvisor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary academic_advisor Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Architect
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary architect Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_BrilliantInventor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary brilliant_inventor Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Bodyguard
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary bodyguard Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Drillmaster
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary drillmaster Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Mathematician
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary mathematician Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Handgun
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary handgun Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Librarian
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary librarian Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_MilitaryEngineer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary military_engineer Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_MoneyCounter
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary money_counter Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_OrdinanceMaster
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary ordinance_master Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Overseer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary overseer Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Quartermaster
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary quartermaster Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Scout
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary scout Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Spymaster
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary spymaster Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Treasurer
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary treasurer Chance  10

;------------------------------------------
Trigger Uninitialized_Tutor
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnStart

    Condition AgentType = family
        and I_TurnNumber < 1

    AcquireAncillary tutor Chance  10
	
;------------------------------------------
Trigger sitting_around_castle_with_stables_dread
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsGeneral
          and EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= knights_stables
          and Attribute Chivalry < -4

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  4 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents12
    WhenToTest SufferAssassinationAttempt
    Condition IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary bodyguard chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents16
    WhenToTest SabotageMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and I_TurnNumber > 85

    AcquireAncillary explosives chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger agents42a
    WhenToTest DenouncementMission
    Condition MissionSucceeded
          and AgentType = inquisitor

    AcquireAncillary executioner chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit8
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= stables

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger spyinit9
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = spy
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= racing_track

    AcquireAncillary black_stallion chance  100 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger merchantinit4
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemists_lab

    AcquireAncillary counterfeiter chance  15 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger merchantinit12
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = merchant
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemy_school

    AcquireAncillary merchant_clerk chance  50 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger factionleader_poor_fighter
    WhenToTest BecomesFactionLeader
    Condition Attribute Command < 4
          and I_TurnNumber > 2

    AcquireAncillary armour_ornate chance  75 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger accomplice_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition AgentType = assassin
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= assassins_guild

    AcquireAncillary accomplice chance  20 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger academic_advisor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished >= library

    AcquireAncillary academic_advisor chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger academic_advisor_vnv_trigger2
    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted
    Condition SettlementBuildingFinished = university

    AcquireAncillary academic_advisor chance  33 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger actor_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= theatre
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary actor chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger adultress_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= coaching_house
          and IsGeneral
          and IsMarried
          and SpouseAttribute Charm < 6
          and Attribute Chivalry < 3

    AcquireAncillary adultress chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger adultress_foreign_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition InEnemyLands
          and IsMarried
          and TimeInRegion > 3
          and Attribute Chivalry < 3

    AcquireAncillary adultress_foreign chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger adultress_she_man_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition IsMarried

    AcquireAncillary adultress_she_man chance  5 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest CharacterTurnEnd
    Condition EndedInSettlement
          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemists_lab
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary alchemist chance  5

    WhenToTest GovernorBuildingCompleted

Trigger pet_monkey_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest AgentCreated
    Condition SettlementBuildingExists >= market
          and AgentType = spy
          and not CultureType northern_european
          and not CultureType southern_european

    AcquireAncillary pet_monkey chance  5 

;------------------------------------------
Trigger physician_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageOfArmyKilled > 50
          and FactionBuildingExists = university
          and IsGeneral
          and not CharacterReligion islam

    AcquireAncillary physician chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and PercentageOfArmyKilled > 50
          and FactionBuildingExists >= bimaristan
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary physician chance  30

    Condition not Routs
          and WonBattle
          and BattleSuccess = crushing
          and not GeneralFoughtInCombat
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary runner chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition WonBattle
          and I_ConflictType SuccessfulAmbush
          and not WasAttacker
          and InEnemyLands
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary scout chance  8

          and RemainingMPPercentage = 100
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= town_hall
          and SettlementBuildingExists >= alchemists_lab
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary scribe_ancillary chance  10 

;------------------------------------------

    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 80
          and GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 5
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and IsGeneral

    AcquireAncillary shieldbearer chance  15

;------------------------------------------
Trigger veteran_warrior_vnv_trigger
    WhenToTest PostBattle
    Condition GeneralNumKillsInBattle > 5
          and WonBattle
          and not Routs
          and IsGeneral
          and GeneralHPLostRatioinBattle <= 50

    AcquireAncillary veteran_warrior chance  50
